title: Import packer-built image to several regions
body:
We are currently researching the best way to share the packer-built image among several regions (ex. us-east and us-south).

Is it currently possible to have packer-built image land in COS instead of capturing it and uploading directly to the image catalog?

If it's not possible - how would you sugg...
